div.p: For studies appearing in WWARN Explorer, study information includes a link to the Pub Med citation(s).
WWARN is committed to ensuring that all data contributors receive credit for their work. There is no limit to the number of individuals and institutions acknowledged.
If a Pub Med ID or DOI was provided in Step 4, the relevant button will automatically populate these fields; there may be a short delay. For unpublished studies complete these fields manually.
The ‘Move down’ button adjusts the order in which names appear in WWARN Explorer.
